name: Sweet Saver
description:
Keep princess Honeymint safe from the invading gingerbread pirates who want to steal her magical dust so their ship can fly again. Scavenge candy from the land to power the portal which will take you both home.

-Controls- 

-movement - 

W,A,S,D

-Combat- 

Left click on peppermint rocks to scavenge peppermint shards. 

Left click to shoot the collected peppermint shards. 

Right click to shoot gumdrop bombs. 

Collect lolipops from lolipop stocks. 

Space bar to use lolipop hammer mele attack.

-other directions- 

Shoot candy at the peppermint portal to charge it. 

Gumdrop bombs also heal princess honeymint.

T to teleport your character back to its spawn point(in case you get stuck). 

R to restart the lvl(in case you spawn in on an object).
